record.title: CONGRATULATING THE GRAND VALLEY STATE UNIVERSITY LAKERS FOR WINNING THE 2006 NCAA DIVISION II FOOTBALL NATIONAL CHAMPIONSHIP
record.chair: The unfinished business is the question of suspending the rules and agreeing to the resolution, H. Res. 62.
record.narrative: The Clerk read the title of the resolution.
record.chair: The question is on the motion offered by the gentleman from Virginia (Mr. Scott) that the House suspend the rules and agree to the resolution, H. Res. 62, on which the yeas and nays are ordered.

speaking.paragraph: Madam Speaker, on rollcall No. 41, on H. Res. 62, I am not recorded. Had I been present, I would have voted "yes."
